meanings.sent1: The cartographers carefully drew the map of the city.
meanings.sent2: Cartographers use special tools to create accurate maps.
meanings.sent3: The cartographers decided to draw a treasure map for fun.
meanings.sent4: The cartographers' minds were like maps, full of intricate details.
meanings.sent5: The cartographers' work was so precise that every street was perfectly depicted.

meanings.definition: Cartographers: those who create visual representations of geographical areas.
meanings.sent1: We hired cartographers to illustrate the mountain ranges on the map.
meanings.sent2: The cartographers added colorful symbols to represent different terrains.
meanings.sent3: The cartographers drew a giant smiley face on the map as a joke.
meanings.sent4: The cartographers' drawings brought the landscapes to life on paper.
meanings.sent5: The cartographers' maps were like windows into unknown lands.

meanings.definition: Cartographers: individuals skilled in the art and science of mapmaking.
meanings.sent1: The cartographers' expertise was evident in the detailed maps they produced.
meanings.sent2: Cartographers spend years honing their craft to accurately represent regions.
meanings.sent3: The cartographers used their skills to create a map that led to a hidden treasure.
meanings.sent4: The cartographers' precision was akin to that of skilled artists.
meanings.sent5: The cartographers' dedication to accuracy made their maps highly sought after.
